name: STARHAULER
description:
Currently a prototype to test out stuff

Starhauler, an infinite procedural universe to explore and trade. Warp to steller bodies and begin your journey. Start trading with huge space freighters, space stations or collect goods from destroyed ships or planets. Build an interstellar trading empire!

I am currently open for suggestions about the actual game. However, I already have a whole list of additions and it is unlikely that yours will be featured.
